```{r}
library(mitools)
library(smcfcs)

set.seed(123)
```

Lineare model

```{r}
#linear model with quadratic covariate effect

imps <- smcfcs(ex_linquad, smtype="lm", smformula="y~z+x+xsq",method=c("","","norm","x^2",""))

# use mitools to fit substantive model to imputed data using rubins rules

impobj <- imputationList(imps$impDatasets)
models <- with(impobj, lm(y~z+x+xsq))
summary(MIcombine(models))

# examine the convergence with 100 iterations and m = 1

imps <- smcfcs(ex_linquad, smtype="lm", smformula="y~z+x+xsq", method=c("","","norm","x^2",""),m=1,numit=100)
plot(imps$smCoefIter[1,3,])
```
